title: Burundi Central Bank Balance Sheet
description: Central Bank Balance Sheet in Burundi remained unchanged at 2524615.60 BIF Million in May from 2524615.60 BIF Million in April of 2022. Central Bank Balance Sheet in Burundi averaged 795264.80 BIF Million from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2524615.60 BIF Million in January of 2022 and a record low of 121110.80 BIF Million in March of 2002. This page provides - Burundi Central Bank Balance Sheet- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Burundi
